meanings.sent1: The secret society had a symboled handshake to identify its members.
meanings.sent2: The ancient manuscript was filled with symboled characters that held hidden meanings.
meanings.sent3: The symboled map led the treasure hunters to a surprising discovery.
meanings.sent4: Her symboled necklace was a reflection of her inner strength and resilience.
meanings.sent5: The symboled flag fluttered proudly in the wind, representing unity and peace.

meanings.definition: Marked or identified with a symbol
meanings.sent1: The symboled door at the end of the hallway was the entrance to the mysterious chamber.
meanings.sent2: The symboled artifacts in the museum were carefully preserved for future generations to admire.
meanings.sent3: The symboled cat statue in the garden seemed to wink mischievously at passersby.
meanings.sent4: His symboled tattoo on his wrist was a constant reminder of his past struggles.
meanings.sent5: The symboled crest on the shield signified the noble lineage of the knight.
